actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-231.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3210) to amend the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1978, to establish obligation limitations for fiscal year 1982, and related purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3210 (Surface Transportation Assistance Act amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3210) to amend the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1978, to establish obligation limitations for fiscal year 1982, and related purposes.
